description.ko: 침묵의 빈 공간에서 액체 물질을 통해 물결치는 소리의 물리적 무게와 시각적 아름다움을 포착했습니다.
description.en: Capturing the physical weight and visual beauty of sound as it ripples through liquid matter in a silent void.

prompt: A sphere of liquid #4169E1 sapphire suspended in a silent void, reacting to a powerful low-frequency soundwave by forming #FFD700 golden cymatic mandalas. Minimalist lines in #FF4500 and #32CD32 intersect the form, visualizing soundwaves through vibrating frequencies. 8k, Octane Render, raytracing. High-speed motion blur on the edges of the vibrating liquid metal, sharp focus on the central resonance. Global illumination reflects the visual consonance of sound as physical weight.
